item.title: Mission
item.description: We are an interdisciplinary research team committed to establishing an intelligent classroom through AI technology. Our aim is to assist teachers in improving their teaching methods based on data and adapting to the new requirements of teaching abilities in the new era. We lead the exploration and practice of educational reform in the era of artificial intelligence. Our research work covers disciplines such as education, psychology, computer science, and artificial intelligence.
